sentences.en: Despite his heterodoxy, faults, and weaknesses, Clare was a man with a conscience.
sentences.cn: 尽管克莱尔相信异端学说，身上有种种缺点和弱点，他仍然是一个具有是非感的人。

sentences.en: Despite his heterodoxy, faults, and weaknesses, he was a man with a conscience.
sentences.cn: 虽然克莱不顾世俗, 有许多缺点, 许多毛病, 但是他却是个有良心的人.

sentences.en: He was already beginning to display quiet symptoms of heterodoxy.
sentences.cn: 当时,他已开始暗暗流露出叛离正统的迹象.
